titles.title: From the ends of the earth

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: From the ends of the earth (From the ends of the earth)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: From the depths of the sea (From the depths of the sea)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: From the heights of the heavens (From the heights of the heavens)

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: From the hearts of the weak (From the hearts of the weak)

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: From the shouts of the strong (From the shouts of the strong)

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: From the lips of all people (From the lips of all people)

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
You will be crowned with praises
Lord Most High
